title: The Conductor. Pt. 1
creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: A look at the art and technique of the conductor. In part one, conductor Verdon Williams discusses his role within the orchestra, use of the baton to keep rhythm; different kinds of rhythms; emphasising staccatto, accents; bringing in new instruments; starting and finishing each movement.
